name: Your Steps Forward
description:
A prototype of an experimental game I've created for one of my university assignments. A top-down survival-adventure game with meta game mechanics.

*Traverse through the mind of a person to learn more about them and help them out from within. Explore the different paths you can take and the resulting outcomes of those decisions.*
As you play through the game, at certain points text files will be created which contribute to the plot

Throughout the game text files will be created which contribute to the game's story. Decisions you take throughout the game might influence the content of these files.

References:

Royalty Free music Gathered from:
TeknoAXE.com
incompetech.com
